title: The French gardiner instructing how to cultivate all sorts of fruit-trees and herbs for the garden : together with directions to dry and conserve them in their natural / first written by R.D.C.D.W.B.D.N. ; and now transplanted into English by Phiocepos.
author: Bonnefons, Nicolas de.
publisher: Printed by J.C. for John Crooke,
notes: "Three times printed in France and once in Holland."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
